title: ‘I hid £80k from my alcoholic husband and now I can’t find it’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I am an 83-year-old widow. I worked all my life for Tesco, finally retiring from the bakery section aged 79. My late husband and I strived always to better ourselves and never to be a burden on this country. We both worked full time and we were always careful not to overextend ourselves.

When the children left home my husband and I agreed that the money that I earned would be put away for our old age to help pay bills. I saved around £80,000 with Woolwich, which has now been taken over by Barclays.

Unfortunately when my husband retired he began to drink...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
